caption.p: Antioxidant activities of P3 and SP3a in vitro: (A): DPPH radical scavenging assay, (B): hydroxy radical scavenging assay, (C): reducing power assay. a-e Different letters indicate a significant difference (p < 0.05) between the concentrations of the same polysaccharide. A−B Different letters indicate a significant difference (p < 0.05) between different polysaccharide in the same concentration (Vitamin C (Vc) was excluded). Results were expressed as mean ± SD (n = 3).
